name: Schweizer Radio und Fernsehen (SRF) Dark Theme
description: This is a simple, dark theme for the website of SRF, srf.ch. I made it for my own use and it's far from perfect, but I fiddled around 40 minutes so I thought I could upload it just as well. It is of course inofficial and in no way affiliated with the SRF.
additional_info:
Version 1 - Initial Release
Most things are dark, the navbar is still a bit ugly

Version 2 - Update because site was restructured
I got most things looking okay again. Sports and Weather pages are a bit mixed in result. I didn't hunt every separation line to make it dark.
